briefdescription.para: Slot called whenever the view resizes or the scene contents change to enforce minimum scene sizes.
Slot to handle page scrolling of the playhead.

detaileddescription.para: If the playhead is outside the current scroll bounds, this function will scroll to where it is. Otherwise it will do nothing.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double &x, const double &x_scale, const rational &timebase, bool round=false)
memberdef.name: SceneToTime

briefdescription.para: A widget for viewing and interacting Sequences.

detaileddescription.para: This widget primarily exposes users to viewing and modifying Block nodes, usually through a TimelineOutput node.
